Page Chronica is an action-oriented word puzzle game that combines elements of side-scrolling action platformers with the forming of words. 

©2012 Red Hare Studios All Rights Reserved. 
"Page Chronica" is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

夢之語術師 Page Chronica為一款充滿動作的文字益智遊戲，在橫向捲軸平台上冒險的同時挑戰玩家的英文拼字能力。

©2012 Red Hare Studios All Rights Reserved. 
"Page Chronica" is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Enjoy the latest "Lights, Camera, Party!" trailer at PlayStation®Home Theatre Auditorium 5!

Feed pizza to an angry dinosaur, throw bananas at a sleeping crowd of monkeys, blast cow-stealing UFOs, jump over a kiddie pool full of hungry sharks and obliterate candy-filled piñatas. All this and so much more in this unique, fast-paced, motion-controlled, insanely hilarious multiplayer party game for up to 8 simultaneous players!

Lights, Camera, Party! is a copyright of Frima Studio inc. © 2012 Frima Studio inc.

請到PlayStation®Home Theatre的劇院5觀賞「Lights, Camera, Party!」的最新影片！

餵披薩給飢餓的恐龍、丟香蕉給正在睡夢中的猴子、擊退偷取乳牛的UFO、跳過都是鯊魚的水池、或破壞充滿糖果的皮納塔。這些都可在這款獨特的爆笑多人遊戲內，以體感方式體驗。一次同時可跟8人遊玩喔！

Lights, Camera, Party! is a copyright of Frima Studio inc. © 2012 Frima Studio inc.

Welcome to Aurora 1.6! Many things have changed since your last visit, explore the islands to see what mysteries you can find. The main island now contains a fun new game called 'Blimps'. Cruise around the sky above Aurora taking in the beautiful views, but look out, your opponents will try to tag you with their upgraded ships. We hope you enjoy the new Aurora experience. Happy exploring!
歡迎來到 Aurora 1.6！自上次造訪以來，許多事情都發生了變化。請探索各個島嶼，發現其神秘之處吧。主要島嶼現在包含一款稱之為「Blimps」的有趣新遊戲。在極光群島的天空巡遊，欣賞美麗景觀，但要留心，您的對手可能會使用升級的艦船尾隨之後。我們希望您喜歡全新的極光群島體驗。盡情探索吧！
Not too late for the summer – Southern Island updated\nWalk around on the island and discover a lot of new things!\nYou can’t take your eyes off from Granzella’s ongoing improvement!
還來得及享受夏天─南島秘密樂園更新！\n在島上走一走，您便可發現許多新的事物！\nGranzella的持續更新，會讓您一直回來！

ITEM.TEXT: Cutthroats: Battle for Black Powder Cove

DESCRIPTION.BODY: Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!

From PlayStation®Home upgrade of version 1.70, you can now make totally new movements on your avatar with “Locomotion” from “nDreams”!\nFind out what kind of movements you can make with “Locomotion” and be among the first one to show off those movements everywhere in PlayStation®Home!
PlayStation®Home更新為1.70版本後，您現在用nDreams的「Locomotion」(擴充活動功能)就可以讓您的分身角色做全新的動作！\n現在就去看看您能用「Locomotion」(擴充活動功能)增加什麼新動作，並在PlayStation®Home炫耀給周遭的人看吧！

Didn’t you always want a robot pal who could shoot fireworks from his butt? Okay, so you probably never thought about it, but it’s definitely cool! PODI is a friendly little machine who loves attention. The more time you spend with him creating displays and setting them off, the happier he becomes and when he’s happy, PODI loves to give out presents! Some of them are for everyone, some are just for you, spend time playing with PODI to make sure you get them all!
今天，Lockwood正式發表了最新煙火技術─「煙火表演介面」─簡稱PODI。從簡短的展示煙火到華麗的大型煙火盛會都可交給PODI來讓您的來客嘆為觀止。您用PODI簡易的操縱介面便可自由選擇要放什麼煙火，要放多少煙火，以及用什麼導火線。如果這些都太複雜的話，只要給PODI揮個手，它便會在你揮完手之前為您放個即興煙火！
Have you enjoyed the beach this summer yet?\nDon’t worry, it’s not too late to enjoy summer activities since we have got a lot of brand new items for it at “Southern Island Hideaway”!
您這個夏天有去海邊享受一番了嗎？\n別擔心，您還可以充分享受夏天的活動！我們在更新的南島秘密樂園有為您準備許多新商品！

ITEM.TEXT: nDreams特別呈現： 終極組合包

DESCRIPTION.HEADER: nDreams特別呈現： 終極組合包
DESCRIPTION.BODY:
nDreams offers you tons of items in five kinds of ultimate bundles at great prices!
The bundles contain costumes, furniture and companions which will come in handy for a big big summer party!
Please note:
・The bundles may contain the items you have already purchased and they will not appear in the wardrobe as new items; only the items which are not yet purchased will appear as new and will be added to your wardrobe.
・This offer is only available for summer in 2012.

nDreams也加入了優惠陣容，並以平價提供給您5種終極組合包！
適合夏天派對的道具，包括服裝、家具、隨身夥伴、都有包括在這些組合包與服裝組內！
請注意：
●這些組合包/服裝組可能包括您已經購買的商品。已購買商品將不會顯示於更衣室裡以新商品顯示。只有尚未購買的商品才會在更衣室裡以新商品顯示。
●此特價優惠為2012年夏季限定。

☆Introducing New Items of the Week☆

You can find the latest released item right here!
Check them out and find your favorite!
☆介紹本週新商品☆\n您可以在此確認最新推出的商品！\n趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！
